string.name: bat_text
string.u: ৳ 5,300 SS Master Kashmir Willow Cricket Bat, Short Handle

resources.string: Product Details of SS Master Kashmir Willow Cricket Bat, Short Handle:

price ৳ 5,300 
SS Master Cricket Bat 
Master series 
Kashmir Willow Bat 
Full Size 
Short Handle 
This SS Master Kashmir Willow Cricket Bat is made for senior men and is of grade one. The handle of the bat is made of sarawak cane which is light yet sturdy. The blade of the bat is made of Kashmir willow which is extremely hardy. The cricket bat comes with extra thick edges for good pickup and is shaped after top range bats. The bat absorbs shock well too preventing damage and strain to your hands in the long run.
